text: Some of the most spectacular moments of the 2018 Winter Olympic Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea. ( Published Sunday, Feb. 25, 2018 ) American Alpine skier Lindsey Vonn, freestyle skier Gus Kenworthy and Pita Taufatofua, the shirtless Tongan flag bearer and cross - country skier, posed for photos and selfies on Sunday at the 2018 Winter Olympics'Closing Ceremony in Pyeongchang, South Korea. ` ` Wow, what an amazing night!''
